Interface m_i_InterpolateValue

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface m_i_InterpolateValue
extends d_i_PropertyFloat
    Defines a generic function to interpolate 2 float values.

                float b,

        Implements an interpolation equation.
        Parameters:
        a - current value
        b - target value
        f - normalized interpolation factor (0.0 .. 1.0)

        interpolated value
